channel.title: Look at this befor posting compile&run error's
channel.description:
Open up your server folder, right click run or compile and click edit then past this in and change the YOURSERVERNAME to your server name.
[code]@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause [/code] or [code]@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause [/code]
also change the 'jdk1.5.0_06 and jre1.5.0_06' to the version's that you got.
You'll know you done it right when it say's this at the end of compile or run:
[code] Starting YOURSERVERNAME Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/code]
Easy, i've seen loads people saying "compile won't work HELP!"

item.title: Look at this befor posting compile&run error's
item.dc:creator: @Pkayer-X Pkayer-X
item.description:
@Pkayer-X wrote:

item.title: Look at this befor posting compile&run error's
item.dc:creator: @J_A_S_O_N_X J A S O N X
item.description:
@J_A_S_O_N_X wrote:

Open up your server folder, right click run or compile and click edit then past this in and change the YOURSERVERNAME to your server name.

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause
or

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

also change the ‘jdk1.5.0_06 and jre1.5.0_06’ to the version’s that you got.

You’ll know you done it right when it say’s this at the end of compile or run:

Starting YOURSERVERNAME Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Easy, i’ve seen loads people saying “compile won’t work HELP!”

Read full topic
item.source: Look at this befor posting compile&run error's
